title: E-Learning Practical Skill Enhancement: Narrative-Based Self-Directed Learning for Sustainable Growth

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational self-reflection skills and intermediate-level language expression abilities
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can structure personal experiences into a narrative format with over 80% accuracy
Learners can express at least three future design scenarios using creative storytelling techniques
Learners can iteratively refine a self-development plan incorporating peer feedback at least twice and create an actionable roadmap
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
